title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Patient engagement increased by 40% with automated reminders and mobile access to PROs.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven prompts for completion based on patient activity patterns.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: CMS penalizes hospitals lacking standardized PRO reporting in oncology care pathways.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may skew results toward healthier patients.
